ClassPropertyParser.summary: The class is used for extracting property information from an object.

IClassPropertyParser.summary: An interface for classes that extract property information from an object.

Constructor1.summary: Creates an instance of the class.

Constructor2.summary: Creates an instance of the class and retrieves all class types defined in the same assembly as the given class type.
Constructor2.param: A class type for which we want to retrieve the property information.

ClassTypes.summary: Gets an collection of objects corresponding to the class types contained in a single assembly.

CollectionProperties.summary:
Gets an collection of objects corresponding to all collection properties found in a single class object.
A collection property is any property that returns a collection of objects.

ComplexProperties.summary:
Gets an collection of objects corresponding to all complex properties found in a single class object.
A complex property is any property that returns an object that is not a value type, , or collection.

SimpleProperties.summary:
Gets an collection of objects corresponding to all simple properties found in a single class object.
A simple property is any property that returns an object that is either a value type or a .

GetTypeName.summary: A static method that gets the fully qualified type name for the given type.
GetTypeName.param: The type for which the fully qualified type name is to be retrieved.
GetTypeName.returns: The fully qualified type name, including generic parameters if applicable.
GetTypeName.exception: Thrown if the given type is generic and the fully qualified name couldn't be determined.
Thrown if the given type is generic and the generic parameters couldn't be determined.

GetAllProperties.summary: Retrieves the property information for all simple, complex, and collection properties defined for the given class type.
GetAllProperties.param: The class type for which we want to retrieve the property information.

GetClassTypes.summary: Retrieves the type information for all visible class types found in the same assembly as the given class type.
GetClassTypes.param: One of the class types from an assembly containing multiple class types.

GetCollectionProperties.summary:
Gets the collection of objects corresponding to all collection properties defined for the given class type.
A collection property is any property that returns a collection of objects.
GetCollectionProperties.param: The class type for which we want to retrieve the collection property information.

GetComplexProperties.summary:
Gets the collection of objects corresponding to all complex properties defined for the given class type.
A complex property is any property that returns an object that is not a value type, , or collection.
GetComplexProperties.param: The class type for which we want to retrieve the complex property information.

GetSimpleProperties.summary:
Gets the collection of objects corresponding to all simple properties defined for the given class type.
A simple property is any property that returns an object that is either a value type or a .
GetSimpleProperties.param: The class type for which we want to retrieve the simple property information.
